name: Demanding Challenge
summary: If your skill check to challenge a foe is a success, the target of your challenge takes a –1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls (or –2 if you critically succeed) until the end of your next turn.
description:
If your skill check to challenge a foe is a success, the target of your challenge takes a –1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls (or –2 if you critically succeed) until the end of your next turn.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
